text: Fluorenylmethyloxycarbonyl chloride (Fmoc-Cl) is a chloroformate ester. It is used to introduce the fluorenylmethyloxycarbonyl protecting group as the Fmoc carbamate. ==Preparation== This compound may be prepared by reacting 9-fluorenylmethanol with phosgene: :450px ==References== Category:Chloroformates Category:Reagents for organic chemistry Category:Reagents for biochemistry Category:Biochemistry methods
title: Fluorenylmethyloxycarbonyl chloride
